Get top-notch leads, boost your Real Estate sales

Receive high-quality leads directly in your inbox and effortlessly convert them into successful sales using LindaSalesPro's built-in sales follow-up tools.

Discover the Advantages of LindaSalesPro

Unlock the power of efficient property management, seamless client communication, and sales follow-up optimization with LindaSalesPro. Join hundreds of satisfied realtors who have transformed their real estate journey with our user-friendly CRM.

Sign up and set up your profile on LindaSalesPro.

Use LindaSalesPro daily to manage your contacts, record sales, and follow up with prospects.

Regularly upload your available properties for sale on your dashboard.

When we receive requests from individuals looking to buy properties, LindaSalesPro quickly filters active real estate agents with similar properties.

The buyer's contact and request are sent to the top 3 matching agents' inboxes.

Matched agents can then contact the prospects and use LindaSalesPro to manage the follow-up process.
